description:
Stack Overflow and OpenAI have announced a partnership that aims to provide developers with accurate and vetted solutions by integrating Stack Overflow’s OverflowAPI and validated technical knowledge into OpenAI’s products, including ChatGPT. Brad Lightcap, COO at OpenAI, said: “Learning from as many languages, cultures, subjects, and industries as possible ensures that our models can serve... Read more »

The post Stack Overflow and OpenAI partner to empower developers appeared first on Developer Tech News.
title: Stack Overflow and OpenAI partner to empower developers
